text: I am wondering if it is possible to simulate typing in an REPL in order to make an [asciinema](<https://asciinema.org/>) automatically.

elements.text: I am wondering if it is possible to simulate typing in an REPL in order to make an [asciinema](

text: I wrote a program for this a long time ago but I'm not sure if it'll work for child processes like a REPL, but feel free to give it a try <http://github.com/christopher-dG/asciiscript|http://github.com/christopher-dG/asciiscript>
